import React from 'react'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import './css/Faq.css'; function Faq() { useEffect(() => { document.getElementById('faq-btn').addEventListener('click', () => { document.getElementsByClassName('faq')[0].scrollIntoView(); }); let questions = document.getElementsByClassName('question'); }, []); return (

Frequently Asked Questions

What is QuizWit?

Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries and more – on thousands of internet-connected devices. You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want, without a single ad – all for one low monthly price. There's always something new to discover, and new TV shows and movies are added every week!
